search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Regiondo (regiondo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Regiondo can be found at: [https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

[Home](https://pro.regiondo.com/) / Pricing

Regiondo booking software pricing
=================================

Plans and pricing that scale with your company. All plans come with a 30-day free trial - no credit card required.

Pricing plans for resellers and DMOs
====================================

Earn commission by reselling operator tickets on your website - choose the plan that’s right for you below.

Operator plan Partner plan

### Starter

Best for small operators just getting started with online sales

**49€ per month**

[Request a quote](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Request a quote")

*   2 users
*   Booking widget
*   Payment gateway
*   Channel manager
*   Google Analytics integration
*   1 language available
*   2 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing#table-1)

### Advanced

Our most popular plan for growing operators with multiple users

**99€ per month**

[Request a quote](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Request a quote")

*   5 users
*   Smart resource manager
*   SMS & email notifications
*   Add-ons and cross-selling
*   API access
*   3 languages available
*   3 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing#table-1)

### Enterprise

Best for large operators with high-volume sales and customisation needs

**199€ per month**

[Talk to sales](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Talk to sales")

*   25 users
*   Product bundles
*   Marketing & SEO tools
*   3,000+ integrations with Zapier
*   11 languages available
*   4 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing#table-1)

Add-on
------

Add this optional extension to any plan for a complete booking experience.

### Website Builder NEW

€49 / month

One-click website builder for operators

[Learn more](https://pro.regiondo.com/website-builder-with-booking-system/)

Compare all plans & features
----------------------------

### Starter

**49€ per month**

[Try for free](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Try for free")

### Advanced

[Try for free](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Try for free")

### Enterprise

**199€ per month**

[Talk to sales](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Talk to sales")

### Basic

Best for small agents and resellers who need more inventory

**Price on request**

[Book a demo](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Book a demo")

*   Earn commission
*   Bookings overview
*   1 available language

### Advanced

Online portals and distributors who want an individual white-label shop

**Price on request**

[Book a demo](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Book a demo")

*   Everything in Basic, plus
*   White-label shop on your website
*   API access
*   2 available languages

### DMO

Powerful 360° solution for destinations and tourism marketing companies

**Price on request**

[Book a demo](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Book a demo")

*   Everything in Advanced, plus
*   Multi-user access
*   Separate supplier accounts
*   11 available languages

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   #### Do you have a free trial?
    
    Yes, all our booking software pricing plans come with a 30-day free trial so you can try out the system and discover the benefits of Regiondo with no strings attached.
    
*   #### How do I get paid?
    
    You'll get weekly payouts via Stripe (our payment processing partner). We'll transfer the sale amount of your tickets, less the commission fees for Regiondo.
    
*   #### I have a seasonal business, do I still need to pay the base fee every month?
    
    We understand that seasonality varies greatly by market and geography in the tours & activity industry. Reach out to us – we are always ready to negotiate and find a common solution.
    
*   #### Do you offer discounts?
    
    Yes, we can offer discounts for DMOs or large businesses depending on your sales volume and preferred plan. Don’t hesitate to contact us, we would be happy to negotiate individual booking software pricing conditions with you.
    
*   #### I am a DMO, travel agency, or reseller - can I partner with you?
    
    Yes, we offer special partner plans that allow you to earn commission by reselling tickets. Compare our partner plans by clicking on the Partner tab at the top of this page.
    
*   #### Can you help me set up Regiondo?
    
    Yes, we have a dedicated onboarding team that will guide you through the system and help you set up your offers with no additional cost.
    
*   #### Can I talk to someone right now about booking software pricing?
    
    Yes, you can start a live chat using the bottom right widget or call us at +44 20 4571 7798 to talk with a product specialist.
    

Need help? Talk to a product expert now.
----------------------------------------

Start chat

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Regiondo offers a 30-day free trial for all plans without requiring a credit card. Additional fees include a ticket fee of €0.49 and a system usage fee of 3%.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Best for small operators just getting started with online sales
Our most popular plan for growing operators with multiple users
Best for large operators with high-volume sales and customisation needs

Regiondo booking software pricing
=================================

Plans and pricing that scale with your company. All plans come with a 30-day free trial - no credit card required.

Pricing plans for resellers and DMOs
====================================

Earn commission by reselling operator tickets on your website - choose the plan that’s right for you below.

Operator plan Partner plan

### Starter

Best for small operators just getting started with online sales

**49€ per month**

[Request a quote](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Request a quote")

*   2 users
*   Booking widget
*   Payment gateway
*   Channel manager
*   Google Analytics integration
*   1 language available
*   2 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing/#table-1)

### Advanced

Our most popular plan for growing operators with multiple users

**99€ per month**

[Request a quote](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Request a quote")

*   5 users
*   Smart resource manager
*   SMS & email notifications
*   Add-ons and cross-selling
*   API access
*   3 languages available
*   3 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing/#table-1)

### Enterprise

Best for large operators with high-volume sales and customisation needs

**199€ per month**

[Talk to sales](https://pro.regiondo.com/book-a-demo/ "Talk to sales")

*   25 users
*   Product bundles
*   Marketing & SEO tools
*   3,000+ integrations with Zapier
*   11 languages available
*   4 hours of dedicated training
*   Ticket fee €0.49
*   System usage fee 3%

[Compare plans](https://pro.regiondo.com/pricing/#table-1)

------

Add this optional extension to any plan for a complete booking experience.

### Website Builder NEW

€49 / month

[Learn more](https://pro.regiondo.com/website-builder-with-booking-system/)

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

*   #### Do you have a free trial?
    
    Yes, all our booking software pricing plans come with a 30-day free trial so you can try out the system and discover the benefits of Regiondo with no strings attached.
    
*   #### How do I get paid?
    
    You'll get weekly payouts via Stripe (our payment processing partner). We'll transfer the sale amount of your tickets, less the commission fees for Regiondo.
    
*   #### I have a seasonal business, do I still need to pay the base fee every month?
    
    We understand that seasonality varies greatly by market and geography in the tours & activity industry. Reach out to us – we are always ready to negotiate and find a common solution.
    
*   #### Do you offer discounts?
    
    Yes, we can offer discounts for DMOs or large businesses depending on your sales volume and preferred plan. Don’t hesitate to contact us, we would be happy to negotiate individual booking software pricing conditions with you.
    
*   #### I am a DMO, travel agency, or reseller - can I partner with you?
    
    Yes, we offer special partner plans that allow you to earn commission by reselling tickets. Compare our partner plans by clicking on the Partner tab at the top of this page.
    
*   #### Can you help me set up Regiondo?
    
    Yes, we have a dedicated onboarding team that will guide you through the system and help you set up your offers with no additional cost.
    
*   #### Can I talk to someone right now about booking software pricing?
    
    Yes, you can start a live chat using the bottom right widget or call us at +44 20 4571 7798 to talk with a product specialist.
    

Need help? Talk to a product expert now.
